snippet: The University of the People, built to reach underserved students around the world, announced Thursday that it had received accreditation.
abstract: University of the People, tuition-free four-year-old online institution built to reach underserved students around the world, announces it has received accreditation.
lead_paragraph: The University of the People, built to reach underserved students around the world, announced Thursday that it had received accreditation.

headline.main: Free Online University Receives Accreditation, in Time for Graduating Class of 7
headline.print_headline: Free Online University Receives Accreditation, in Time for Graduating Class of 7
